reviewText: I actually know one of the people in this movie plus its an awesome movie. I had to add it to the collection.
The Confessions of a thug reveals the inner-world of the drug underworld, a world in which a persons life can be snuffed out in the blink of an eye. Totally moving.

I try my best not to criticize too hard, but some of these films are just a plain hot mess. Confessions of a Thugs wasn't terrible, but its not too far from it. The story line was week and the acting wasn't all that great. The only thing in the film that was good was the music. I will put it this way, I wouldn't spend my money on this buying it boolegged.
This is a moving film , has it's emotions. acting is not bad. plot is good , rapping is great.
